description: It's ticket with some added stuff. Its good for a gateway game, or for when you want something less thinky. A fun enough rummy game.
This is one of our favourite games.  One that we know well, understand well, and doesn't make people groan when we suggest it.  Like a pair of comfortable train-ers, we feel at home with it!
I will never turn down a play of Ticket to Ride. It is such an elegant design. It’s everything I love about gaming
It's ticket to ride, I prefer it over the original but there isn't much in it.
